snippet.title: Falling Rain - Announce Teaser
snippet.description:
Falling Rain is a third-person anime shooting RPG game with advance movement mechanic. Immerse yourself in a post apocalypse world and experiences the character struggle and follow the character to the end of their story.

Player can play as various character in the game and experiences the character story and connect to the character emotionally.
Build relationship with specific NPC, search for resources to prolong NPC lifespan, growth stronger and save the world before the end of humanity.

【Steam Wishlist】
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2895070/Falling_Rain/

【Our Links】
．Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/ALKLgame
．Twitter : https://x.com/Sobrious_Dev

【Credits】

Elmer : https://www.youtube.com/@elmerdraco3
Zephyrianna : https://x.com/zephyrianna

#steam #indiegames2024 #animegame #tps #pcgame #indiedev #solodev
